00060 /************************************************************************/
00061 extern rpl_of_t RPL_OF;
00062 static rpl_of_t * const objective_functions[] = {&RPL_OF};

00064 /************************************************************************/
00065 #ifndef RPL_CONF_MAX_PARENTS_PER_DAG
00066 #define RPL_MAX_PARENTS_PER_DAG       8
00067 #else
00068 #define RPL_MAX_PARENTS_PER_DAG       RPL_CONF_MAX_PARENTS_PER_DAG
00069 #endif /* !RPL_CONF_MAX_PARENTS_PER_DAG */
00070 
00071 /************************************************************************/
00072 /* RPL definitions. */
00073 
00074 #ifndef RPL_CONF_GROUNDED
00075 #define RPL_GROUNDED                    0
00076 #else
00077 #define RPL_GROUNDED                    RPL_CONF_GROUNDED
00078 #endif /* !RPL_CONF_GROUNDED */
00079 
00080 /************************************************************************/
00081 /* Allocate parents from the same static MEMB chunk to reduce memory waste. */
00082 MEMB(parent_memb, struct rpl_parent,
00083      RPL_MAX_PARENTS_PER_DAG * RPL_MAX_INSTANCES * RPL_MAX_DAG_PER_INSTANCE);
00084 /************************************************************************/
00085 /* Allocate instance table. */
00086 rpl_instance_t instance_table[RPL_MAX_INSTANCES];
00087 rpl_instance_t *default_instance;
00088 /************************************************************************/
00089 /* Greater-than function for the lollipop counter.                      */
00090 /************************************************************************/
00091 int rpl_lollipop_greater_than(int a, int b) {
00092   /* Check if we are comparing an initial value with an old value */
00093   if(a > RPL_LOLLIPOP_CIRCULAR_REGION && b <= RPL_LOLLIPOP_CIRCULAR_REGION) {
00094     return (RPL_LOLLIPOP_MAX_VALUE + 1 + b - a) > RPL_LOLLIPOP_SEQUENCE_WINDOWS;
00095   }
00096   /* Otherwise check if a > b and comparable => ok, or
00097      if they have wrapped and are still comparable */
00098   return (a > b && (a - b) < RPL_LOLLIPOP_SEQUENCE_WINDOWS) ||
00099     (a < b && (b - a) > (RPL_LOLLIPOP_CIRCULAR_REGION + 1-
00100                          RPL_LOLLIPOP_SEQUENCE_WINDOWS));
00101 }
00102 /************************************************************************/
00103 /* Remove DAG parents with a rank that is at least the same as minimum_rank. */
00104 static void
00105 remove_parents(rpl_dag_t *dag, rpl_rank_t minimum_rank)
00106 {
00107   rpl_parent_t *p, *p2;
00108 
00109   PRINTF("RPL: Removing parents (minimum rank %u)\n",
00110         minimum_rank);
00111 
00112   for(p = list_head(dag->parents); p != NULL; p = p2) {
00113     p2 = p->next;
00114     if(p->rank >= minimum_rank) {
00115       rpl_remove_parent(dag, p);
00116     }
00117   }
00118 }
00119 /************************************************************************/
00120 static void
00121 nullify_parents(rpl_dag_t *dag, rpl_rank_t minimum_rank)
00122 {
00123   rpl_parent_t *p, *p2;
00124 
00125   PRINTF("RPL: Removing parents (minimum rank %u)\n",
00126         minimum_rank);
00127 
00128   for(p = list_head(dag->parents); p != NULL; p = p2) {
00129     p2 = p->next;
00130     if(p->rank >= minimum_rank) {
00131       rpl_nullify_parent(dag, p);
00132     }
00133   }
00134 }
00135 /************************************************************************/
00136 static void
00137 remove_worst_parent(rpl_dag_t *dag, rpl_rank_t min_worst_rank)
00138 {
00139   rpl_parent_t *p, *worst;
00140 
00141   PRINTF("RPL: Removing the worst parent\n");
00142 
00143   /* Find the parent with the highest rank. */
00144   worst = NULL;
00145   for(p = list_head(dag->parents); p != NULL; p = list_item_next(p)) {
00146     if(p != dag->preferred_parent &&
00147        (worst == NULL || p->rank > worst->rank)) {
00148       worst = p;
00149     }
00150   }
00151   /* Remove the neighbor if its rank is worse than the minimum worst rank. */
00152   if(worst != NULL && worst->rank > min_worst_rank) {
00153     rpl_remove_parent(dag, worst);
00154   }
00155 }
00156 /************************************************************************/
00157 static int
00158 should_send_dao(rpl_instance_t *instance, rpl_dio_t *dio, rpl_parent_t *p)
00159 {
00160   /* if MOP is set to no downward routes no DAO should be sent */
00161   if(instance->mop == RPL_MOP_NO_DOWNWARD_ROUTES) {
00162     return 0;
00163   }
00164   /* check if the new DTSN is more recent */
00165   return p == instance->current_dag->preferred_parent &&
00166     (rpl_lollipop_greater_than(dio->dtsn, p->dtsn));
00167 }
00168 /************************************************************************/
00169 static int
00170 acceptable_rank(rpl_dag_t *dag, rpl_rank_t rank)
00171 {
00172   return rank != INFINITE_RANK &&
00173     ((dag->instance->max_rankinc == 0) ||
00174      DAG_RANK(rank, dag->instance) <= DAG_RANK(dag->min_rank + dag->instance->max_rankinc, dag->instance));
00175 }
00176 /************************************************************************/
00177 rpl_dag_t *
00178 rpl_set_root(uint8_t instance_id, uip_ipaddr_t *dag_id)
00179 {
00180   rpl_dag_t *dag;
00181   rpl_instance_t *instance;
00182   uint8_t version;
00183 
00184   version = RPL_LOLLIPOP_INIT;
00185   dag = rpl_get_dodag(instance_id, dag_id);
00186   if(dag != NULL) {
00187     version = dag->version;
00188     RPL_LOLLIPOP_INCREMENT(version);
00189     PRINTF("RPL: Dropping a joined DAG when setting this node as root");
00190     if(dag == dag->instance->current_dag) {
00191       dag->instance->current_dag = NULL;
00192     }
00193     rpl_free_dodag(dag);
00194   }
00195 
00196   dag = rpl_alloc_dodag(instance_id, dag_id);
00197   if(dag == NULL) {
00198     PRINTF("RPL: Failed to allocate a DAG\n");
00199     return NULL;
00200   }
00201 
00202   instance = dag->instance;
00203 
00204   dag->version = version;
00205   dag->joined = 1;
00206   dag->grounded = RPL_GROUNDED;
00207   instance->mop = RPL_MOP_DEFAULT;
00208   instance->of = &RPL_OF;
00209   dag->preferred_parent = NULL;
00210 
00211   memcpy(&dag->dag_id, dag_id, sizeof(dag->dag_id));
00212 
00213   instance->dio_intdoubl = RPL_DIO_INTERVAL_DOUBLINGS;
00214   instance->dio_intmin = RPL_DIO_INTERVAL_MIN;
00215   /* The current interval must differ from the minimum interval in order to
00216      trigger a DIO timer reset. */
00217   instance->dio_intcurrent = RPL_DIO_INTERVAL_MIN +
00218     RPL_DIO_INTERVAL_DOUBLINGS;
00219   instance->dio_redundancy = RPL_DIO_REDUNDANCY;
00220   instance->max_rankinc = RPL_MAX_RANKINC;
00221   instance->min_hoprankinc = RPL_MIN_HOPRANKINC;
00222   instance->default_lifetime = RPL_DEFAULT_LIFETIME;
00223   instance->lifetime_unit = RPL_DEFAULT_LIFETIME_UNIT;
00224 
00225   dag->rank = ROOT_RANK(instance);
00226 
00227   if(instance->current_dag != dag && instance->current_dag != NULL) {
00228     /* Remove routes installed by DAOs. */
00229     rpl_remove_routes(instance->current_dag);
00230 
00231     instance->current_dag->joined = 0;
00232   }
00233 
00234   instance->current_dag = dag;
00235   instance->dtsn_out = RPL_LOLLIPOP_INIT;
00236   instance->of->update_metric_container(instance);
00237   default_instance = instance;
00238 
00239   PRINTF("RPL: Node set to be a DAG root with DAG ID ");
00240   PRINT6ADDR(&dag->dag_id);
00241   PRINTF("\n");
00242 
00243   ANNOTATE("#A root=%u\n", dag->dag_id.u8[sizeof(dag->dag_id) - 1]);
00244 
00245   rpl_reset_dio_timer(instance);
00246 
00247   return dag;
00248 }
00249 /************************************************************************/
00250 int
00251 rpl_repair_root(uint8_t instance_id)
00252 {
00253   rpl_instance_t *instance;
00254 
00255   instance = rpl_get_instance(instance_id);
00256   if(instance == NULL ||
00257      instance->current_dag->rank != ROOT_RANK(instance)) {
00258     return 0;
00259   }
00260 
00261   RPL_LOLLIPOP_INCREMENT(instance->current_dag->version);
00262   RPL_LOLLIPOP_INCREMENT(instance->dtsn_out);
00263   rpl_reset_dio_timer(instance);
00264   return 1;
00265 }
00266 /************************************************************************/
00267 static void
00268 set_ip_from_prefix(uip_ipaddr_t *ipaddr, rpl_prefix_t *prefix)
00269 {
00270   memset(ipaddr, 0, sizeof(uip_ipaddr_t));
00271   memcpy(ipaddr, &prefix->prefix, (prefix->length + 7) / 8);
00272   uip_ds6_set_addr_iid(ipaddr, &uip_lladdr);
00273 }
00274 /************************************************************************/
00275 static void
00276 check_prefix(rpl_prefix_t *last_prefix, rpl_prefix_t *new_prefix)
00277 {
00278   uip_ipaddr_t ipaddr;
00279   uip_ds6_addr_t *rep;
00280 
00281   if(last_prefix != NULL && new_prefix != NULL &&
00282      last_prefix->length == new_prefix->length &&
00283      uip_ipaddr_prefixcmp(&last_prefix->prefix, &new_prefix->prefix, new_prefix->length) &&
00284      last_prefix->flags == new_prefix->flags) {
00285     /* Nothing has changed. */
00286     return;
00287   }
00288 
00289   if(last_prefix != NULL) {
00290     set_ip_from_prefix(&ipaddr, last_prefix);
00291     rep = uip_ds6_addr_lookup(&ipaddr);
00292     if(rep != NULL) {
00293       PRINTF("RPL: removing global IP address ");
00294       PRINT6ADDR(&ipaddr);
00295       PRINTF("\n");
00296       uip_ds6_addr_rm(rep);
00297     }
00298   }
00299   
00300   if(new_prefix != NULL) {
00301     set_ip_from_prefix(&ipaddr, new_prefix);
00302     if(uip_ds6_addr_lookup(&ipaddr) == NULL) {
00303       PRINTF("RPL: adding global IP address ");
00304       PRINT6ADDR(&ipaddr);
00305       PRINTF("\n");
00306       uip_ds6_addr_add(&ipaddr, 0, ADDR_AUTOCONF);
00307     }
00308   }
00309 }
00310 /************************************************************************/
00311 int
00312 rpl_set_prefix(rpl_dag_t *dag, uip_ipaddr_t *prefix, unsigned len)
00313 {
00314   if(len > 128) {
00315     return 0;
00316   }
00317 
00318   memset(&dag->prefix_info.prefix, 0, sizeof(dag->prefix_info.prefix));
00319   memcpy(&dag->prefix_info.prefix, prefix, (len + 7) / 8);
00320   dag->prefix_info.length = len;
00321   dag->prefix_info.flags = UIP_ND6_RA_FLAG_AUTONOMOUS;
00322   PRINTF("RPL: Prefix set - will announce this in DIOs\n");
00323   /* Autoconfigure an address if this node does not already have an address
00324      with this prefix. */
00325   check_prefix(NULL, &dag->prefix_info);
00326   return 1;
00327 }
00328 /************************************************************************/
00329 int
00330 rpl_set_default_route(rpl_instance_t *instance, uip_ipaddr_t *from)
00331 {
00332   if(instance->def_route != NULL) {
00333     if(instance->def_route->isused) {
00334       PRINTF("RPL: Removing default route through ");
00335       PRINT6ADDR(&instance->def_route->ipaddr);
00336       PRINTF("\n");
00337       uip_ds6_defrt_rm(instance->def_route);
00338     }
00339     instance->def_route = NULL;
00340   }
00341 
00342   if(from != NULL) {
00343     PRINTF("RPL: Adding default route through ");
00344     PRINT6ADDR(from);
00345     PRINTF("\n");
00346     instance->def_route = uip_ds6_defrt_add(from,
00347                                             RPL_LIFETIME(instance,
00348                                                          instance->default_lifetime));
00349     if(instance->def_route == NULL) {
00350       return 0;
00351     }
00352   }
00353   return 1;
00354 }
00355 /************************************************************************/
00356 rpl_instance_t *
00357 rpl_alloc_instance(uint8_t instance_id)
00358 {
00359   rpl_instance_t *instance, *end;
00360 
00361   for(instance = &instance_table[0], end = instance + RPL_MAX_INSTANCES; instance < end; ++instance) {
00362     if(instance->used == 0) {
00363       memset(instance, 0, sizeof(*instance));
00364       instance->instance_id = instance_id;
00365       instance->def_route = NULL;
00366       instance->used = 1;
00367       return instance;
00368     }
00369   }
00370   return NULL;
00371 }
00372 /************************************************************************/
00373 rpl_dag_t *
00374 rpl_alloc_dodag(uint8_t instance_id, uip_ipaddr_t *dag_id)
00375 {
00376   rpl_dag_t *dag, *end;
00377   rpl_instance_t *instance;
00378 
00379   instance = rpl_get_instance(instance_id);
00380   if(instance == NULL ) {
00381     instance = rpl_alloc_instance(instance_id);
00382     if(instance == NULL ) {
00383       RPL_STAT(rpl_stats.mem_overflows++);
00384       return NULL;
00385     }
00386     dag = &instance->dag_table[0];
00387     dag->parents = &dag->parent_list;
00388     list_init(dag->parents);
00389     dag->used = 1;
00390     dag->rank = INFINITE_RANK;
00391     dag->min_rank = INFINITE_RANK;
00392     dag->instance = instance;
00393     instance->current_dag = dag;
00394     return dag;
00395   }
00396 
00397   for(dag = &instance->dag_table[0], end = dag + RPL_MAX_DAG_PER_INSTANCE; dag < end; ++dag) {
00398     if(!dag->used) {
00399       memset(dag, 0, sizeof(*dag));
00400       dag->parents = &dag->parent_list;
00401       list_init(dag->parents);
00402       dag->used = 1;
00403       dag->rank = INFINITE_RANK;
00404       dag->min_rank = INFINITE_RANK;
00405       dag->instance = instance;
00406       return dag;
00407     }
00408   }
00409   return NULL;
00410 }
00411 /************************************************************************/
00412 void
00413 rpl_set_default_instance(rpl_instance_t *instance)
00414 {
00415   default_instance = instance;
00416 }
00417 /************************************************************************/
00418 void
00419 rpl_free_instance(rpl_instance_t *instance)
00420 {
00421   rpl_dag_t *dag;
00422   rpl_dag_t *end;
00423 
00424   PRINTF("RPL: Leaving the instance %u\n", instance->instance_id);
00425 
00426   /* Remove any DAG inside this instance */
00427   for(dag = &instance->dag_table[0], end = dag + RPL_MAX_DAG_PER_INSTANCE; dag < end; ++dag) {
00428     if(dag->used) {
00429       rpl_free_dodag(dag);
00430     }
00431   }
00432 
00433   rpl_set_default_route(instance, NULL);
00434 
00435   ctimer_stop(&instance->dio_timer);
00436   ctimer_stop(&instance->dao_timer);
00437 
00438   if(default_instance == instance) {
00439     default_instance = NULL;
00440   }
00441 
00442   instance->used = 0;
00443 }
00444 /************************************************************************/
00445 void
00446 rpl_free_dodag(rpl_dag_t *dag)
00447 {
00448   if(dag->joined) {
00449     PRINTF("RPL: Leaving the DAG ");
00450     PRINT6ADDR(&dag->dag_id);
00451     PRINTF("\n");
00452     dag->joined = 0;
00453 
00454     /* Remove routes installed by DAOs. */
00455     rpl_remove_routes(dag);
00456 
00457    /* Remove autoconfigured address */
00458     if((dag->prefix_info.flags & UIP_ND6_RA_FLAG_AUTONOMOUS)) {
00459       check_prefix(&dag->prefix_info, NULL);
00460     }
00461 
00462     remove_parents(dag, 0);
00463   }
00464   dag->used = 0;
00465 }
00466 /************************************************************************/
00467 rpl_parent_t *
00468 rpl_add_parent(rpl_dag_t *dag, rpl_dio_t *dio, uip_ipaddr_t *addr)
00469 {
00470   rpl_parent_t *p;
00471 
00472   p = memb_alloc(&parent_memb);
00473   if(p == NULL) {
00474     RPL_STAT(rpl_stats.mem_overflows++);
00475     return NULL;
00476   }
00477   memcpy(&p->addr, addr, sizeof(p->addr));
00478   p->dag = dag;
00479   p->rank = dio->rank;
00480   p->dtsn = dio->dtsn;
00481   p->link_metric = INITIAL_LINK_METRIC;
00482   memcpy(&p->mc, &dio->mc, sizeof(p->mc));
00483   list_add(dag->parents, p);
00484   return p;
00485 }
00486 /************************************************************************/
00487 rpl_parent_t *
00488 rpl_find_parent(rpl_dag_t *dag, uip_ipaddr_t *addr)
00489 {
00490   rpl_parent_t *p;
00491 
00492   for(p = list_head(dag->parents); p != NULL; p = p->next) {
00493     if(uip_ipaddr_cmp(&p->addr, addr)) {
00494       return p;
00495     }
00496   }
00497   return NULL;
00498 }
00499 
00500 /************************************************************************/
00501 static rpl_dag_t *
00502 find_parent_dag(rpl_instance_t *instance, uip_ipaddr_t *addr)
00503 {
00504   rpl_parent_t *p;
00505   rpl_dag_t *dag, *end;
00506 
00507   for(dag = &instance->dag_table[0], end = dag + RPL_MAX_DAG_PER_INSTANCE; dag < end; ++dag) {
00508     if(dag->used) {
00509       for(p = list_head(dag->parents); p != NULL; p = p->next) {
00510         if(uip_ipaddr_cmp(&p->addr, addr)) {
00511           return dag;
00512         }
00513       }
00514     }
00515   }
00516   return NULL;
00517 }
00518 /************************************************************************/
00519 rpl_parent_t *
00520 rpl_find_parent_any_dag(rpl_instance_t *instance, uip_ipaddr_t *addr)
00521 {
00522   rpl_parent_t *p;
00523   rpl_dag_t *dag, *end;
00524 
00525   for(dag = &instance->dag_table[0], end = dag + RPL_MAX_DAG_PER_INSTANCE; dag < end; ++dag) {
00526     if(dag->used) {
00527       for(p = list_head(dag->parents); p != NULL; p = p->next) {
00528         if(uip_ipaddr_cmp(&p->addr, addr)) {
00529           return p;
00530         }
00531       }
00532     }
00533   }
00534   return NULL;
00535 }
00536 /************************************************************************/
00537 rpl_dag_t *
00538 rpl_select_dodag(rpl_instance_t *instance, rpl_parent_t *p)
00539 {
00540   rpl_parent_t *last_parent;
00541   rpl_dag_t *dag, *end, *best_dag;
00542   rpl_rank_t old_rank;
00543 
00544   old_rank = instance->current_dag->rank;
00545   last_parent = instance->current_dag->preferred_parent;
00546 
00547   best_dag = instance->current_dag;
00548   if(best_dag->rank != ROOT_RANK(instance)) {
00549     if(rpl_select_parent(p->dag) != NULL) {
00550       if(p->dag != best_dag) {
00551         best_dag = instance->of->best_dag(best_dag, p->dag);
00552       }
00553     } else if(p->dag == best_dag) {
00554       best_dag = NULL;
00555       for(dag = &instance->dag_table[0], end = dag + RPL_MAX_DAG_PER_INSTANCE; dag < end; ++dag) {
00556         if(dag->used && dag->preferred_parent != NULL && dag->preferred_parent->rank != INFINITE_RANK) {
00557           if(best_dag == NULL) {
00558             best_dag = dag;
00559           } else {
00560             best_dag = instance->of->best_dag(best_dag, dag);
00561           }
00562         }
00563       }
00564     }
00565   }
00566 
00567   if(best_dag == NULL) {
00568     /* No parent found: the calling function handle this problem. */
00569     return NULL;
00570   }
00571 
00572   if(instance->current_dag != best_dag) {
00573     /* Remove routes installed by DAOs. */
00574     rpl_remove_routes(instance->current_dag);
00575 
00576     PRINTF("RPL: New preferred DAG: ");
00577     PRINT6ADDR(&best_dag->dag_id);
00578     PRINTF("\n");
00579 
00580     if(best_dag->prefix_info.flags & UIP_ND6_RA_FLAG_AUTONOMOUS) {
00581       check_prefix(&instance->current_dag->prefix_info, &best_dag->prefix_info);
00582     } else if(instance->current_dag->prefix_info.flags & UIP_ND6_RA_FLAG_AUTONOMOUS) {
00583       check_prefix(&instance->current_dag->prefix_info, NULL);
00584     }
00585 
00586     best_dag->joined = 1;
00587     instance->current_dag->joined = 0;
00588     instance->current_dag = best_dag;
00589   }
00590 
00591   instance->of->update_metric_container(instance);
00592   /* Update the DAG rank. */
00593   best_dag->rank = instance->of->calculate_rank(best_dag->preferred_parent, 0);
00594   if(best_dag->rank < best_dag->min_rank) {
00595     best_dag->min_rank = best_dag->rank;
00596   } else if(!acceptable_rank(best_dag, best_dag->rank)) {
00597     PRINTF("RPL: New rank unacceptable!\n");
00598     instance->current_dag->preferred_parent = NULL;
00599     if(instance->mop != RPL_MOP_NO_DOWNWARD_ROUTES && last_parent != NULL) {
00600       /* Send a No-Path DAO to the removed preferred parent. */
00601       dao_output(last_parent, RPL_ZERO_LIFETIME);
00602     }
00603     return NULL;
00604   }
00605 
00606   if(best_dag->preferred_parent != last_parent) {
00607     rpl_set_default_route(instance, &best_dag->preferred_parent->addr);
00608     PRINTF("RPL: Changed preferred parent, rank changed from %u to %u\n",
00609         (unsigned)old_rank, best_dag->rank);
00610     RPL_STAT(rpl_stats.parent_switch++);
00611     if(instance->mop != RPL_MOP_NO_DOWNWARD_ROUTES) {
00612       if(last_parent != NULL) {
00613         /* Send a No-Path DAO to the removed preferred parent. */
00614         dao_output(last_parent, RPL_ZERO_LIFETIME);
00615       }
00616       /* The DAO parent set changed - schedule a DAO transmission. */
00617       RPL_LOLLIPOP_INCREMENT(instance->dtsn_out);
00618       rpl_schedule_dao(instance);
00619     }
00620     rpl_reset_dio_timer(instance);
00621   } else if(best_dag->rank != old_rank) {
00622     PRINTF("RPL: Preferred parent update, rank changed from %u to %u\n",
00623         (unsigned)old_rank, best_dag->rank);
00624   }
00625   return best_dag;
00626 }
00627 /************************************************************************/
00628 rpl_parent_t *
00629 rpl_select_parent(rpl_dag_t *dag)
00630 {
00631   rpl_parent_t *p, *best;
00632 
00633   best = NULL;
00634   for(p = list_head(dag->parents); p != NULL; p = p->next) {
00635     if(p->rank == INFINITE_RANK) {
00636       /* ignore this neighbor */
00637     } else if(best == NULL) {
00638       best = p;
00639     } else {
00640       best = dag->instance->of->best_parent(best, p);
00641     }
00642   }
00643 
00644   if(best != NULL) {
00645     dag->preferred_parent = best;
00646   }
00647 
00648   return best;
00649 }
00650 /************************************************************************/
00651 void
00652 rpl_remove_parent(rpl_dag_t *dag, rpl_parent_t *parent)
00653 {
00654   rpl_nullify_parent(dag, parent);
00655 
00656   PRINTF("RPL: Removing parent ");
00657   PRINT6ADDR(&parent->addr);
00658   PRINTF("\n");
00659 
00660   list_remove(dag->parents, parent);
00661   memb_free(&parent_memb, parent);
00662 }
00663 /************************************************************************/
00664 void
00665 rpl_nullify_parent(rpl_dag_t *dag, rpl_parent_t *parent)
00666 {
00667   if(parent == dag->preferred_parent) {
00668     dag->preferred_parent = NULL;
00669     dag->rank = INFINITE_RANK;
00670     if(dag->joined) {
00671       if(dag->instance->def_route != NULL) {
00672         if(dag->instance->def_route->isused) {
00673           PRINTF("RPL: Removing default route ");
00674           PRINT6ADDR(&parent->addr);
00675           PRINTF("\n");
00676           uip_ds6_defrt_rm(dag->instance->def_route);
00677         }
00678         dag->instance->def_route = NULL;
00679       }
00680       dao_output(parent, RPL_ZERO_LIFETIME);
00681     }
00682   }
00683 
00684   PRINTF("RPL: Nullifying parent ");
00685   PRINT6ADDR(&parent->addr);
00686   PRINTF("\n");
00687 }
00688 /************************************************************************/
00689 void
00690 rpl_move_parent(rpl_dag_t *dag_src, rpl_dag_t *dag_dst, rpl_parent_t *parent)
00691 {
00692   if(parent == dag_src->preferred_parent) {
00693       dag_src->preferred_parent = NULL;
00694       dag_src->rank = INFINITE_RANK;
00695     if(dag_src->joined && dag_src->instance->def_route != NULL) {
00696       if(dag_src->instance->def_route->isused) {
00697         PRINTF("RPL: Removing default route ");
00698         PRINT6ADDR(&parent->addr);
00699         PRINTF("\n");
00700         uip_ds6_defrt_rm(dag_src->instance->def_route);
00701       }
00702       dag_src->instance->def_route = NULL;
00703     }
00704   } else if(dag_src->joined) {
00705     /* Remove uIPv6 routes that have this parent as the next hop. */
00706     rpl_remove_routes_by_nexthop(&parent->addr, dag_src);
00707   }
00708 
00709   PRINTF("RPL: Moving parent ");
00710   PRINT6ADDR(&parent->addr);
00711   PRINTF("\n");
00712 
00713   list_remove(dag_src->parents, parent);
00714   parent->dag = dag_dst;
00715   list_add(dag_dst->parents, parent);
00716 }
00717 /************************************************************************/
00718 rpl_dag_t *
00719 rpl_get_any_dag(void)
00720 {
00721   int i;
00722 
00723   for(i = 0; i < RPL_MAX_INSTANCES; ++i) {
00724     if(instance_table[i].used && instance_table[i].current_dag->joined) {
00725       return instance_table[i].current_dag;
00726     }
00727   }
00728   return NULL;
00729 }
00730 /************************************************************************/
00731 rpl_instance_t *
00732 rpl_get_instance(uint8_t instance_id)
00733 {
00734   int i;
00735 
00736   for(i = 0; i < RPL_MAX_INSTANCES; ++i) {
00737     if(instance_table[i].used && instance_table[i].instance_id == instance_id) {
00738       return &instance_table[i];
00739     }
00740   }
00741   return NULL;
00742 }
00743 /************************************************************************/
00744 rpl_dag_t *
00745 rpl_get_dodag(uint8_t instance_id, uip_ipaddr_t *dag_id)
00746 {
00747   rpl_instance_t *instance;
00748   rpl_dag_t *dag;
00749   int i;
00750 
00751   instance = rpl_get_instance(instance_id);
00752   if(instance == NULL) {
00753     return NULL;
00754   }
00755 
00756   for(i = 0; i < RPL_MAX_DAG_PER_INSTANCE; ++i) {
00757     dag = &instance->dag_table[i];
00758     if(dag->used && uip_ipaddr_cmp(&dag->dag_id, dag_id)) {
00759       return dag;
00760     }
00761   }
00762 
00763   return NULL;
00764 }
00765 /************************************************************************/
00766 rpl_of_t *
00767 rpl_find_of(rpl_ocp_t ocp)
00768 {
00769   unsigned int i;
00770 
00771   for(i = 0;
00772       i < sizeof(objective_functions) / sizeof(objective_functions[0]);
00773       i++) {
00774     if(objective_functions[i]->ocp == ocp) {
00775       return objective_functions[i];
00776     }
00777   }
00778 
00779   return NULL;
00780 }
00781 /************************************************************************/
00782 void
00783 rpl_join_instance(uip_ipaddr_t *from, rpl_dio_t *dio)
00784 {
00785   rpl_instance_t *instance;
00786   rpl_dag_t *dag;
00787   rpl_parent_t *p;
00788   rpl_of_t *of;
00789 
00790   dag = rpl_alloc_dodag(dio->instance_id, &dio->dag_id);
00791   if(dag == NULL) {
00792     PRINTF("RPL: Failed to allocate a DAG object!\n");
00793     return;
00794   }
00795 
00796   instance = dag->instance;
00797 
00798   p = rpl_add_parent(dag, dio, from);
00799   PRINTF("RPL: Adding ");
00800   PRINT6ADDR(from);
00801   PRINTF(" as a parent: ");
00802   if(p == NULL) {
00803     PRINTF("failed\n");
00804     instance->used = 0;
00805     return;
00806   }
00807   p->dtsn = dio->dtsn;
00808   PRINTF("succeeded\n");
00809 
00810   /* Determine the objective function by using the
00811      objective code point of the DIO. */
00812   of = rpl_find_of(dio->ocp);
00813   if(of == NULL) {
00814     PRINTF("RPL: DIO for DAG instance %u does not specify a supported OF\n",
00815         dio->instance_id);
00816     rpl_remove_parent(dag, p);
00817     instance->used = 0;
00818     return;
00819   }
00820 
00821   /* Autoconfigure an address if this node does not already have an address
00822      with this prefix. */
00823   if((dio->prefix_info.flags & UIP_ND6_RA_FLAG_AUTONOMOUS)) {
00824     check_prefix(NULL, &dio->prefix_info);
00825   }
00826 
00827   dag->joined = 1;
00828   dag->preference = dio->preference;
00829   dag->grounded = dio->grounded;
00830   dag->version = dio->version;
00831 
00832   instance->of = of;
00833   instance->mop = dio->mop;
00834   instance->dtsn_out = RPL_LOLLIPOP_INIT;
00835   instance->instance_id = dio->instance_id;
00836 
00837   instance->max_rankinc = dio->dag_max_rankinc;
00838   instance->min_hoprankinc = dio->dag_min_hoprankinc;
00839   instance->dio_intdoubl = dio->dag_intdoubl;
00840   instance->dio_intmin = dio->dag_intmin;
00841   instance->dio_intcurrent = instance->dio_intmin + instance->dio_intdoubl;
00842   instance->dio_redundancy = dio->dag_redund;
00843   instance->default_lifetime = dio->default_lifetime;
00844   instance->lifetime_unit = dio->lifetime_unit;
00845 
00846   memcpy(&dag->dag_id, &dio->dag_id, sizeof(dio->dag_id));
00847 
00848   /* copy prefix information into the dag */
00849   memcpy(&dag->prefix_info, &dio->prefix_info, sizeof(rpl_prefix_t));
00850 
00851   dag->preferred_parent = p;
00852   instance->of->update_metric_container(instance);
00853   dag->rank = instance->of->calculate_rank(p, 0);
00854   dag->min_rank = dag->rank; /* So far this is the lowest rank we know of. */
00855 
00856   if(default_instance == NULL) {
00857     default_instance = instance;
00858   }
00859 
00860   PRINTF("RPL: Joined DAG with instance ID %u, rank %hu, DAG ID ",
00861          dio->instance_id, dag->rank);
00862   PRINT6ADDR(&dag->dag_id);
00863   PRINTF("\n");
00864 
00865   ANNOTATE("#A join=%u\n", dag->dag_id.u8[sizeof(dag->dag_id) - 1]);
00866 
00867   rpl_reset_dio_timer(instance);
00868   rpl_set_default_route(instance, from);
00869 
00870   if(instance->mop != RPL_MOP_NO_DOWNWARD_ROUTES) {
00871     rpl_schedule_dao(instance);
00872   } else {
00873     PRINTF("RPL: The DIO does not meet the prerequisites for sending a DAO\n");
00874   }
00875 }
00876 
00877 /************************************************************************/
00878 void
00879 rpl_add_dodag(uip_ipaddr_t *from, rpl_dio_t *dio)
00880 {
00881   rpl_instance_t *instance;
00882   rpl_dag_t *dag, *previous_dag;
00883   rpl_parent_t *p;
00884   rpl_of_t *of;
00885 
00886   dag = rpl_alloc_dodag(dio->instance_id, &dio->dag_id);
00887   if(dag == NULL) {
00888     PRINTF("RPL: Failed to allocate a DAG object!\n");
00889     return;
00890   }
00891 
00892   instance = dag->instance;
00893 
00894   previous_dag = find_parent_dag(instance, from);
00895   if(previous_dag == NULL) {
00896     PRINTF("RPL: Adding ");
00897     PRINT6ADDR(from);
00898     PRINTF(" as a parent: ");
00899     p = rpl_add_parent(dag, dio, from);
00900     if(p == NULL) {
00901       PRINTF("failed\n");
00902       dag->used = 0;
00903       return;
00904     }
00905     PRINTF("succeeded\n");
00906   } else {
00907     p = rpl_find_parent(previous_dag, from);
00908     if(p != NULL) {
00909       rpl_move_parent(previous_dag, dag, p);
00910     }
00911   }
00912 
00913   /* Determine the objective function by using the
00914      objective code point of the DIO. */
00915   of = rpl_find_of(dio->ocp);
00916   if(of != instance->of ||
00917      instance->mop != dio->mop ||
00918      instance->max_rankinc != dio->dag_max_rankinc ||
00919      instance->min_hoprankinc != dio->dag_min_hoprankinc ||
00920      instance->dio_intdoubl != dio->dag_intdoubl ||
00921      instance->dio_intmin != dio->dag_intmin ||
00922      instance->dio_redundancy != dio->dag_redund ||
00923      instance->default_lifetime != dio->default_lifetime ||
00924      instance->lifetime_unit != dio->lifetime_unit) {
00925     PRINTF("RPL: DIO for DAG instance %u uncompatible with previos DIO\n",
00926            dio->instance_id);
00927     rpl_remove_parent(dag, p);
00928     dag->used = 0;
00929     return;
00930   }
00931 
00932   dag->used = 1;
00933   dag->grounded = dio->grounded;
00934   dag->preference = dio->preference;
00935   dag->version = dio->version;
00936 
00937   memcpy(&dag->dag_id, &dio->dag_id, sizeof(dio->dag_id));
00938 
00939   /* copy prefix information into the dag */
00940   memcpy(&dag->prefix_info, &dio->prefix_info, sizeof(rpl_prefix_t));
00941 
00942   dag->preferred_parent = p;
00943   dag->rank = instance->of->calculate_rank(p, 0);
00944   dag->min_rank = dag->rank; /* So far this is the lowest rank we know of. */
00945 
00946   PRINTF("RPL: Joined DAG with instance ID %u, rank %hu, DAG ID ",
00947          dio->instance_id, dag->rank);
00948   PRINT6ADDR(&dag->dag_id);
00949   PRINTF("\n");
00950 
00951   ANNOTATE("#A join=%u\n", dag->dag_id.u8[sizeof(dag->dag_id) - 1]);
00952 
00953   rpl_process_parent_event(instance, p);
00954   p->dtsn = dio->dtsn;
00955 }
00956 
00957 /************************************************************************/
00958 static void
00959 global_repair(uip_ipaddr_t *from, rpl_dag_t *dag, rpl_dio_t *dio)
00960 {
00961   rpl_parent_t *p;
00962 
00963   remove_parents(dag, 0);
00964   dag->version = dio->version;
00965   dag->instance->of->reset(dag);
00966   dag->min_rank = INFINITE_RANK;
00967   RPL_LOLLIPOP_INCREMENT(dag->instance->dtsn_out);
00968 
00969   p = rpl_add_parent(dag, dio, from);
00970   if(p == NULL) {
00971     PRINTF("RPL: Failed to add a parent during the global repair\n");
00972     dag->rank = INFINITE_RANK;
00973   } else {
00974     dag->rank = dag->instance->of->calculate_rank(p, 0);
00975     dag->min_rank = dag->rank ;
00976     rpl_process_parent_event(dag->instance, p);
00977   }
00978 
00979   PRINTF("RPL: Participating in a global repair (version=%u, rank=%hu)\n",
00980          dag->version, dag->rank);
00981 
00982   RPL_STAT(rpl_stats.global_repairs++);
00983 }
00984 /************************************************************************/
00985 void
00986 rpl_local_repair(rpl_instance_t *instance)
00987 {
00988   int i;
00989 
00990   PRINTF("RPL: Starting a local instance repair\n");
00991   for(i = 0; i < RPL_MAX_DAG_PER_INSTANCE; i++) {
00992     if(instance->dag_table[i].used) {
00993       instance->dag_table[i].rank = INFINITE_RANK;
00994       nullify_parents(&instance->dag_table[i], 0);
00995     }
00996   }
00997 
00998   rpl_reset_dio_timer(instance);
00999 
01000   RPL_STAT(rpl_stats.local_repairs++);
01001 }
01002 /************************************************************************/
01003 void
01004 rpl_recalculate_ranks(void)
01005 {
01006   rpl_instance_t *instance, *end;
01007   rpl_parent_t *p;
01008   int i;
01009 
01010   /*
01011    * We recalculate ranks when we receive feedback from the system rather
01012    * than RPL protocol messages. This periodical recalculation is called
01013    * from a timer in order to keep the stack depth reasonably low.
01014    */
01015   for(instance = &instance_table[0], end = instance + RPL_MAX_INSTANCES; instance < end; ++instance) {
01016     if(instance->used) {
01017       for(i = 0; i < RPL_MAX_DAG_PER_INSTANCE; i++) {
01018         if(instance->dag_table[i].used) {
01019           for(p = list_head(instance->dag_table[i].parents); p != NULL; p = p->next) {
01020             if(p->updated) {
01021               p->updated = 0;
01022               if(!rpl_process_parent_event(instance, p)) {
01023                 PRINTF("RPL: A parent was dropped\n");
01024               }
01025               /*
01026                * Stop calculating here because the parent list may have changed.
01027                * If more ranks need to be recalculated, it will be taken care of
01028                * in subsequent calls to this functions.
01029                */
01030               break;
01031             }
01032           }
01033         }
01034       }
01035     }
01036   }
01037 }
01038 /************************************************************************/
01039 int
01040 rpl_process_parent_event(rpl_instance_t *instance, rpl_parent_t *p)
01041 {
01042   rpl_rank_t old_rank;
01043   int return_value;
01044 
01045   old_rank = instance->current_dag->rank;
01046   return_value = 1;
01047 
01048   if(p->rank == INFINITE_RANK) {
01049     /* This parent is no longer valid */
01050     PRINTF("RPL: This parent is no longer valid \n");
01051     if(p != instance->current_dag->preferred_parent) {
01052       rpl_nullify_parent(p->dag, p);
01053       return 0;
01054     } else {
01055       rpl_nullify_parent(p->dag, p);
01056       return_value = 0;
01057     }
01058   } else if(!acceptable_rank(p->dag, p->rank)) {
01059     /* The candidate parent is no longer valid: the rank increase resulting
01060        from the choice of it as a parent would be too high. */
01061     PRINTF("RPL: Unacceptable rank\n");
01062     if(p != instance->current_dag->preferred_parent) {
01063       rpl_nullify_parent(p->dag, p);
01064       return 0;
01065     } else {
01066       rpl_nullify_parent(p->dag, p);
01067       return_value = 0;
01068     }
01069   }
01070 
01071   if(rpl_select_dodag(instance, p) == NULL) {
01072     /* No suitable parent; trigger a local repair. */
01073     PRINTF("RPL: No parents found in any DAG\n");
01074     rpl_local_repair(instance);
01075     return 0;
01076   }
01077 
01078 #if DEBUG
01079   if(DAG_RANK(old_rank, instance) != DAG_RANK(instance->current_dag->rank, instance)) {
01080     PRINTF("RPL: Moving in the instance from rank %hu to %hu\n",
01081            DAG_RANK(old_rank, instance), DAG_RANK(instance->current_dag->rank, instance));
01082     if(instance->current_dag->rank != INFINITE_RANK) {
01083       PRINTF("RPL: The preferred parent is ");
01084       PRINT6ADDR(&instance->current_dag->preferred_parent->addr);
01085       PRINTF(" (rank %u)\n",
01086            (unsigned)DAG_RANK(instance->current_dag->preferred_parent->rank, instance));
01087     } else {
01088       PRINTF("RPL: We don't have any parent");
01089     }
01090   }
01091 #endif /* DEBUG */
01092 
01093   return return_value;
01094 }
01095 /************************************************************************/
01096 void
01097 rpl_process_dio(uip_ipaddr_t *from, rpl_dio_t *dio)
01098 {
01099   rpl_instance_t *instance;
01100   rpl_dag_t *dag, *previous_dag;
01101   rpl_parent_t *p;
01102 
01103   if(dio->mop != RPL_MOP_DEFAULT) {
01104     PRINTF("RPL: Ignoring a DIO with an unsupported MOP: %d\n", dio->mop);
01105     return;
01106   }
01107 
01108   if(dio->rank == INFINITE_RANK) {
01109     PRINTF("RPL: Ignoring DIO from node with infinite rank: ");
01110     PRINT6ADDR(from);
01111     PRINTF("\n");
01112     return;
01113   }
01114 
01115   instance = rpl_get_instance(dio->instance_id);
01116   if(instance == NULL) {
01117     PRINTF("RPL: New instance detected: Joining...\n");
01118     rpl_join_instance(from, dio);
01119     return;
01120   }
01121 
01122   dag = rpl_get_dodag(dio->instance_id, &dio->dag_id);
01123   if(dag == NULL) {
01124     PRINTF("RPL: Adding new dodag to known instance.\n");
01125     rpl_add_dodag(from, dio);
01126     return;
01127   }
01128 
01129   if(rpl_lollipop_greater_than(dio->version, dag->version)) {
01130     if(dag->rank == ROOT_RANK(instance)) {
01131       PRINTF("RPL: Root received inconsistent DIO version number\n");
01132       dag->version = dio->version;
01133       RPL_LOLLIPOP_INCREMENT(dag->version);
01134       rpl_reset_dio_timer(instance);
01135     } else {
01136       global_repair(from, dag, dio);
01137     }
01138     return;
01139   } else {
01140     if(rpl_lollipop_greater_than(dag->version, dio->version)) {
01141       /* The DIO sender is on an older version of the DAG. */
01142       PRINTF("RPL: old version received => inconsistency detected\n");
01143       if(dag->joined) {
01144         rpl_reset_dio_timer(instance);
01145         return;
01146       }
01147     }
01148   }
01149 
01150   if(dio->rank == INFINITE_RANK) {
01151     if(dag->joined) {
01152       rpl_reset_dio_timer(instance);
01153     }
01154   } else if(dio->rank < ROOT_RANK(instance)) {
01155     PRINTF("RPL: Ignoring DIO with too low rank: %u\n",
01156            (unsigned)dio->rank);
01157     return;
01158   }
01159 
01160   if(dag->rank == ROOT_RANK(instance)) {
01161     if(dio->rank != INFINITE_RANK) {
01162       instance->dio_counter++;
01163     }
01164     return;
01165   }
01166 
01167   /*
01168    * At this point, we know that this DIO pertains to a DAG that
01169    * we are already part of. We consider the sender of the DIO to be
01170    * a candidate parent, and let rpl_process_parent_event decide
01171    * whether to keep it in the set.
01172    */
01173 
01174   p = rpl_find_parent(dag, from);
01175   if(p == NULL) {
01176     previous_dag = find_parent_dag(instance, from);
01177     if(previous_dag == NULL) {
01178       if(RPL_PARENT_COUNT(dag) == RPL_MAX_PARENTS_PER_DAG) {
01179         /* Make room for a new parent. */
01180         remove_worst_parent(dag, dio->rank);
01181       }
01182       /* Add the DIO sender as a candidate parent. */
01183       p = rpl_add_parent(dag, dio, from);
01184       if(p == NULL) {
01185         PRINTF("RPL: Failed to add a new parent (");
01186         PRINT6ADDR(from);
01187         PRINTF(")\n");
01188         return;
01189       }
01190       PRINTF("RPL: New candidate parent with rank %u: ", (unsigned)p->rank);
01191       PRINT6ADDR(from);
01192       PRINTF("\n");
01193     } else {
01194       p = rpl_find_parent(previous_dag, from);
01195       rpl_move_parent(previous_dag, dag, p);
01196     }
01197   } else {
01198     if(p->rank == dio->rank) {
01199       PRINTF("RPL: Received consistent DIO\n");
01200       if(dag->joined) {
01201         instance->dio_counter++;
01202       }
01203     } else {
01204       p->rank=dio->rank;
01205     }
01206   }
01207 
01208   PRINTF("RPL: preferred DAG ");
01209   PRINT6ADDR(&instance->current_dag->dag_id);
01210   PRINTF(", rank %u, min_rank %u, ",
01211          instance->current_dag->rank, instance->current_dag->min_rank);
01212   PRINTF("parent rank %u, parent etx %u, link metric %u, instance etx %u\n",
01213          p->rank, p->mc.obj.etx, p->link_metric, instance->mc.obj.etx);
01214 
01215   /* We have allocated a candidate parent; process the DIO further. */
01216 
01217   memcpy(&p->mc, &dio->mc, sizeof(p->mc));
01218   if(rpl_process_parent_event(instance, p) == 0) {
01219     PRINTF("RPL: The candidate parent is rejected\n");
01220     return;
01221   }
01222 
01223   /* We don't use route control, so we can have only one official parent. */
01224   if(dag->joined && p == dag->preferred_parent) {
01225     if(should_send_dao(instance, dio, p)) {
01226       RPL_LOLLIPOP_INCREMENT(instance->dtsn_out);
01227       rpl_schedule_dao(instance);
01228     }
01229   }
01230   p->dtsn = dio->dtsn;
01231 }
01232 /************************************************************************/
